title: Your Teacher I, am Hella Rich - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Gamers   Hiding True Identity   Misunderstandings   MMORPG   Modern Day   Wealthy Characters
author: Mo Chen Huan   莫晨欢
description:
On a certain day, Ji Xiao Li led his newly-acquired disciple into a dungeon, feeding him all sorts of priceless red and blue potions.

Teammate: F*ck, tyrant, do you have an ore mine at home?

Ji Xiao Li: How did you know my family owns an ore mine?

【Teacher Orders a Salute：disciple, enter the sect, accept my guidance. Tell this teacher, what is the sect’s ancestral creed?】

【Milk Tea Small Crisp：Master, there are only you and I in this sect, what ancestral creed?】

【Teacher Orders a Salute：Evil, evil disciple! I said to say it so say it!】

【Milk Tea Small Crisp：……】

【Milk Tea Small Crisp：Beat to death YueJian Chunhe that son of a b*tch!】

YueJian ChunHe = Milk Tea Small Crisp = Ruan Fenghe

Teacher Orders a Salute = Ji Xiao Li>
